title: 一个关于mc1.7+的命令方块的问题
author: Legofan9403
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Legofan9403 于 2013-12-15 16:47 编辑 

我发帖想问几个新的命令：
1.有没有检测指定位置有无某方块的命令（我貌似看到过什么什么“TestforBlock”的，是不是啊）？
2.Icy的采矿神器中在指定坐标放置某方块的命令。
3.还有哪些新命令呢？

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
1./testblock X Y Z
2./summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~ ~ 
{Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",

Command:"/setblock ~-3 ~-1 ~ 27 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-2 ~-1 ~ 27 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~ 27 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~3 ~1 ~ 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~1 ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~1 ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~ 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~3 ~ ~ 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~ ~ 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~ ~1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~ ~-1 0 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~ 152 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~ 157 0 destroy"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~ 152 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~ 157 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-2 ~ 152 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~ 157 0 replace"}
3./summon

replies.author: Legofan9403
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2013-12-13 21:57 
哪个是setblock命令
你用采矿神器时会看到信息栏有n个XX has placed

replies.author: wxr155
replies.txt_content: = =确定MOD能添加指令？我都没见过啊

replies.author: Legofan9403
replies.txt_content:
吾是新手渣渣 发表于 2013-12-14 19:01 
1./testblock X Y Z
2./summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~ ~ 
{Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
我已经把奖励改成100枚了，只求详细点儿的介绍。还有，“/testblock X Y Z”能否加上方块ID？

replies.author: 吾是新手渣渣
replies.txt_content:
Legofan9403 发表于 2013-12-15 16:51 
我已经把奖励改成100枚了，只求详细点儿的介绍。还有，“/testblock X Y Z”能否加上方块ID？
/testblock ID X Y Z

replies.author: 不死鸟
replies.txt_content: 你用采矿神器时会看到信息栏有n个XX has placed
